com.salesforce.androidsdk.push
Class PushService

java.lang.Object
  IntentService
      com.salesforce.androidsdk.push.PushService

public class PushService
extends IntentService

This class houses functionality related to push notifications. It performs registration and unregistration of push notifications against the Salesforce connected app endpoint. It also receives push notifications sent by the org to the registered user/device.

Author:
bhariharan, ktanna

Nested Class Summary
static class PushService.RetryRegistrationAlarmReceiver
          Broadcast receiver to retry the entire push registration process (GCM + SFDC).

          Broadcast receiver to retry SFDC push registration.
static class PushService.UnregisterRetryAlarmReceiver
          Broadcast receiver to retry GCM registration.
